arcane_railgun.name: Arcane Railgun
arcane_railgun.description: A bolt that when shot can travels through multiple enemies, piercing each one in it's path. Does less damage and costs more

arcane_blast.name: Arcane Blast
arcane_blast.description: A bolt that explodes into smaller bolts on impact.

arcane_spray.name: Arcane Spray
arcane_spray.description: A large number of short-range bolts in a cone.

damage_amp.name: Damage-amplified
damage_amp.description: Increased damage and increased mana cost.

doubler.name: Doubled
doubler.description: Spell is cast a second time after a small delay; increased mana cost and cooldown.

splitter.name: Split
splitter.description: Spell is cast twice in slightly different directions; increased mana cost.

chaos.name: Chaotic
chaos.description: Significantly increased damage, but projectile is spiraling.

homing.name: Homing
homing.description: Homing projectile, with decreased damage and increased mana cost.

caffeinate.name: Caffeinated
caffeinate.description: Dramatically lower damage and mana cost. Slightly increased speed

piercing.name: Piercing
piercing.description: Allows the spell to pierce through an enemy. Can stack.

recoiling.name: Recoiling
recoiling.description: Increases the damage of the spell, adding recoil.
